raw_body: PHILIPS – GUNAM (Formerly of Sugar Corporation,​ Kantalai) – Beloved husband of Premi Philips (formerly of Bank of Ceylon),​ loving father of Navin,​ Nishan and Nadhini,​ father-in-law of Kavita,​ Nilu and Gunaranjan. Remains lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Kalubowila on 19th July 2023 from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.30 p.m. for cremation at Kohuwala Cemetery.043983
